title: How to Make Easy Egg Drop Soup

steps.headline: Cook until the egg is firm.

text: Pour chicken broth into a stove-pot, and set the stove on high. Warm  the scallions gently in the broth. Whisk the egg in a separate bowl.  When the chicken broth is boiling, swirl the soup rapidly, and dribble the egg into it. Keep swirling continuously, so the egg coagulates into thin noodle-like strands. Cook until the egg is firm. Pour into bowls and enjoy! (Serves 2) Finished.
